column1: Echuir was the Sindarin name for the Stirring
column2: the Elves season that lay before Spring.
column3: pp. 128-9 (entry "Stirring") In the Reckoning of Rivendell it was the last season of the year
column4: and corresponded more or less to the 54 days between 11 February and 4 April in the Shire Calendar.
